name: Lonely Ramblin' Seed
description:
Lonely Ramblin' Seed
Made for Global Game Jam 2023!

You are a lonely little seed in a big universe just looking for love and to lay down roots, only for your new little Rambler to head off and do it all over again.

Watch out for thorns, they will drag you down and keep you from finding love with what little time you have!

An atmospheric adventure game controlled by rolling seeds.
Survive by connecting with other cosmic seeds and see how many generations your family can grow!

Controls:
Left Stick/WASD - Roll seed in a direction
 A Button/Spacebar - Jump
Right Stick - Rotate Camera
